name: Food Craze Chef Cooking Games
description:
New Time Management Game – FOOD CRAZE CHEF COOKING GAMES- The Most Amazingly Fun Cooking Game Ever!

****COOKING IS LOVE**** Let's Cook and Build your own Restaurant Empire to become the Super chef in this new Restaurant Games. "Food Craze Chef Cooking Games" is presenting the new burger shop, pizza shop, drinks shop, Japanese sushi and new ingredients to serve! Come to the Food Craze Restaurant and discover new recipes. It's a Fun and tasty Cooking game. You are a Super Chef! Cook tasty meals! DOWNLOAD to play "Food Craze Chef Cooking Games" TODAY!

****MAKE YOUR DAY**** This highly time management game brings you the Best Chef. Cook delicious dishes and desserts from all kinds of cuisines, it may be tough but if you are ready to take coking challenges, Food Craze Chef is a perfect place for you. Never be bored while you are playing and serve tasty cuisines. You'll be feeling like Master Chef!

****COOKING CRAZINESS****Cook in your own way. This new super addictive cooking game awaits a lot of new and crazy chef for their kitchen. Start with a single restaurant. At the early level offers a simple cooking fun. Make delicious cuisines to upgrade level up and expand your restaurant empire includes new kitchen like Japanese Restaurant, Donut Shop, Burger Shop etc. Cook Tasty Food. Yummy!

Game Features:
■ LET'S COOK over 100+ recipes to serve in your restaurant empire
■ UNLOCK new and exciting burger and drink sho
■ CHALLENGING levels with tons of upgrades KITCHEN to become the best chef
■ COOK hundreds of different dishes with tons of spicy flavor
■ Expand your business and feed the world
■ SHARE your score via social network

Start your food business and upgrade your restaurant empire as you unlock new levels. A new "Food Craze Chef Cooking Games" a fun and twist for the lover of food and time management games. You will be cooking as a master chef and serving your customers - Burgers, Donuts, Drinks, Sushi etc. Cook in all over the world. This will be the hottest food making game. Keep customers happy and serve them the best food items on Food Street. Cooking Fun!

DOWNLOAD to start playing new cooking game fun with new recipes just like a real kitchen story! Upgrade your Kitchen and produce a variety of dishes. This frantic time management cooking game gives you lots of variety of Fun! Build your own restaurant empire. Have Fun COOKING SIMULATION GAME!

Leave a review and let us know what you think about this fun game. We will use feedback In our upcoming updates!
